scripts.build: npm run compile-sass && tsc && npm run copy-views
scripts.lint:ci: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:njk
scripts.start:dev: NODE_WATCH="npm run watch:node:dev" npm run start:template
scripts.start:integration:refer-disabled: NODE_WATCH="npm run watch:node:integration:refer-disabled" npm run start:template
scripts.start:integration: NODE_WATCH="npm run watch:node:integration" npm run start:template
scripts.start:template: npm run build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Views,TypeScript,Node,Sass" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,blue.bold" "npm run watch:views" "npm run watch:ts" "$NODE_WATCH" "npm run watch:sass"
scripts.test:integration:ci:server: export $(cat integration.env) REDIS_PORT=6379 && node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.test:integration:cli:server: export $(cat integration.env) && node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.test:integration:cli: npm run test:integration:start-backing-services && start-server-and-test test:integration:cli:server http://localhost:3007/ping test:integration:cli:run
scripts.test:integration:refer-disabled:ci:serve: export $(cat integration.env) REDIS_PORT=6379 REFER_ENABLED=false && node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.test:integration:refer-disabled:cli:serv: export $(cat integration.env) REFER_ENABLED=false && node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.test:integration:refer-disabled:cli: npm run test:integration:start-backing-services && start-server-and-test test:integration:refer-disabled:cli:server http://localhost:3007/ping test:integration:refer-disabled:cli:run
scripts.test:integration:refer-disabled:ui: npm run test:integration:start-backing-services && start-server-and-test test:integration:refer-disabled:ui:server http://localhost:3007/ping test:integration:refer-disabled:ui:run
scripts.test:integration:ui: npm run test:integration:start-backing-services && start-server-and-test test:integration:ui:server http://localhost:3007/ping test:integration:ui:run
scripts.test-history:integration: script/test-history --test="npm run build && npm run test:integration:cli && npm run test:integration:refer-disabled:cli"
scripts.watch:node:dev: DEBUG=gov-starter-server* nodemon -r dotenv/config --watch dist/ dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.watch:node:integration:refer-disabled: export $(cat integration.env) REFER_ENABLED=false && nodemon --watch dist/ $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.watch:node:integration: export $(cat integration.env) && nodemon --watch dist/ $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION dist/server.js | bunyan -o short
scripts.watch:views: nodemon --watch server/views -e html,njk -x npm run copy-views
